snippet: Otto Pérez Molina, who resigned as president last week, is in detention, charged with bribery, customs fraud and conspiracy.
abstract: Guatemalan judge orders former Pres Otto Perez Molina to stand trial on bribery, customs fraud and conspiracy charges, and sends him back to detention; charges stem from discovery of multi-million dollar customs fraud that has united Guatemalans against government corruption.
lead_paragraph: Otto Pérez Molina, who resigned as president last week, is in detention, charged with bribery, customs fraud and conspiracy.

headline.main: Trial Ordered for Ex-Leader of Guatemala
headline.print_headline: Trial Ordered for Ex-Leader of Guatemala
